content:
I updated to Lean 3.32.1 and that fixed my problem. Thanks for your help!

I had assumed that there wouldn't be a significant difference between 3.32 and 3.31 and I guess I was wrong.
Adrian has marked this topic as resolved.

Strictly speaking, this isn't because of any significant difference between 3.31 and 3.32, but rather that lean checks the version before using the downloaded olean files, so if you have the wrong version then it will recompile everything and probably run out of memory
Just out of curiosity how much memory does it take?
